snippet.title: JUJU gamescom 2014 Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Run, bounce, and chant with the shaman panda, Juju, and his lizard sidekick, Peyo, as they embark upon a dangerous journey to rescue Juju's father and save the world from an ancient evil. 
See this in-engine cinematic trailer how it all begins.
Coming this Fall to PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
Visit JUJU on:
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/jujuandpeyo
JUJU home http://jujuandpeyo.com/
